topic.title: Site Settings
topic.section:
On the Site Settings page, the Administrator enters basic information about the site including its description and contact information. Here, the Administrator can change the administration username and password.

The following fields appear on the Site Settings page:

  • Site Title: This is the primary title of the Harvester2 installation.
  • Introduction: This message is displayed on the Harvester2 home page. Unfiltered HTML tags may be used.
  • About the Site description: This message is displayed under the "About" page.
  • Username: This is the administrator's username
  • Password: This is the administrator's password. To leave the password unchanged, leave this field blank. Both this field and the "Repeat Password" field must match.
  • Name of principal contact: This name will appear as the contact person for the installation.
  • Email of principal contact: This email address will appear as the contact person for the installation.
